phrs.translation: 示踪同位素；同位素指示剂；示踪物

sentences.sentence: Isotopic analysis of shells allowed geologists to measure another glacial effect.
sentences.translation: 对贝壳的同位素分析使得地质学家可以测量另一种冰川效应。

sentences.sentence: You've got some radioactive isotopic that can spontaneously decay into some other nucleus.
sentences.translation: 我们有一些放射性同位素，这些同位素会自发变成其他的原子核。

sentences.sentence: The trick they used to do this was to look at the isotopic composition of the oxygen in the wood of local trees.
sentences.translation: 他们所使用的办法是观测当地树木的木材中的氧同位素组成（isotopic composition）。
